review.title: “An unstable working environment that became hostile with constant mood swings made the communication in the office null.”
review.pros: Pros – They were very willing to give time off when needed for family or school reasons. Time off or a flex schedule was a big bonus.
review.cons: Cons – Hostility. Mood swings. Management upheaval. Lacking communication. Office rules could change from hour to hour. No training. After asking the office manager for help she said "Sorry, there is nobody to help you, you are on your own." This was not an isolated event as this was a reoccuring pattern.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Leadership training with a specialization in communication skills for both the owner and manager to not only work better with staff but more importantly, with each other.
